channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flytipping down the whole alley, 24th January
item.description:
The whole alleyway is filled with debris including furniture, household waste and building waste. The flytipping has become worse over the last two months. It is a biohazard and is dangerous for the families and wildlife. The whole alleyway at the end of Oak Road and next to Moat Lane is filled with it.

Report on FixMyStreet
